name: silent-mode
title: Silent Mode
description: Mute notifications without turning on DND, Just like on iPhone!
author: matan

commands.name: turn-on-silent-mode
commands.title: Turn on Silent Mode
commands.description: Silence the alert sound for all notifications

commands.name: turn-off-silent-mode
commands.title: Turn off Silent Mode
commands.description: Enable the alert sound for all notifications

commands.name: toggle-silent-mode
commands.title: Toggle Silent Mode
commands.description: Toggle the alert sound for all notifications

commands.name: silent-mode-menu-bar
commands.title: Silent Mode Menu Bar
commands.description: Show Silent Mode in the Menu Bar

preferences.name: alert-volume
preferences.title: Alert Volume
preferences.description: The volume of the alert sound when Silent Mode is disabled

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
